[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thi.ng/leb128](./leb128.md)

## leb128 package

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [decodeSLEB128](./leb128.decodesleb128.md) | Takes Uint8Array with LEB128 encoded signed varint and an optional start index to decode from. Returns 2-tuple of decoded value and number of bytes consumed. Consumes up to 10 bytes from <code>src</code>. |
|  [decodeULEB128](./leb128.decodeuleb128.md) | Takes Uint8Array with LEB128 encoded unsigned varint and an optional start index to decode from. Returns 2-tuple of decoded value and number of bytes consumed. Consumes up to 10 bytes from <code>src</code>. |
|  [encodeSLEB128](./leb128.encodesleb128.md) | Encodes signed integer <code>x</code> into LEB128 varint format and returns encoded bytes. |
|  [encodeULEB128](./leb128.encodeuleb128.md) | Encodes unsigned integer <code>x</code> into LEB128 varint format and returns encoded bytes. Values &lt; 0 will be encoded as zero. |
